mapper.select: select SID, PROJECTID, PRODUCTID, STYPE, SLEVEL, FLAG, TRANSLATEFLAG, PRICEFLAG, CONTENTFLAG, PICFLAG, DESIGNFLAG, PUBLICFLAG, TRANSLATEOPER, PRICEOPER, CONTENTOPER, PICOPER, DESIGNOPER, PUBLICOPER, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, TRANSLATETIME, PRICETIME, CONTENTTIME, PICTIME, DESIGNTIME, PUBLICTIME, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CHECKFLAG, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, CORPID, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE from db_projectproduct where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, PROJECTID, PRODUCTID, STYPE, SLEVEL, FLAG, TRANSLATEFLAG, PRICEFLAG, CONTENTFLAG, PICFLAG, DESIGNFLAG, PUBLICFLAG, TRANSLATEOPER, PRICEOPER, CONTENTOPER, PICOPER, DESIGNOPER, PUBLICOPER, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, TRANSLATETIME, PRICETIME, CONTENTTIME, PICTIME, DESIGNTIME, PUBLICTIME, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CHECKFLAG, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, CORPID, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE from db_projectproduct
mapper.sql: SID , PROJECTID , PRODUCTID , STYPE , SLEVEL , FLAG , TRANSLATEFLAG , PRICEFLAG , CONTENTFLAG , PICFLAG , DESIGNFLAG , PUBLICFLAG , TRANSLATEOPER , PRICEOPER , CONTENTOPER , PICOPER , DESIGNOPER , PUBLICOPER , ENDTIME , DATEDIFF , TRANSLATETIME , PRICETIME , CONTENTTIME , PICTIME , DESIGNTIME , PUBLICTIME , OPER , OPERTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , CHECKFLAG , CHECKOPER , CHECKTIME , CORPID , PRODUCTNAME , DESCR , SHOPTYPE , SALESOURCE

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRANSLATEFLAG = #{translateflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRICEFLAG = #{priceflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CONTENTFLAG = #{contentflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICFLAG = #{picflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DESIGNFLAG = #{designflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PUBLICFLAG = #{publicflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRANSLATEOPER = #{translateoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRICEOPER = #{priceoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CONTENTOPER = #{contentoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICOPER = #{picoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DESIGNOPER = #{designoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PUBLICOPER = #{publicoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DATEDIFF = #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TRANSLATETIME = #{translatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PRICETIME = #{pricetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CONTENTTIME = #{contenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PICTIME = #{pictime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DESIGNTIME = #{designtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PUBLICTIME = #{publictime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPE = #{shoptype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SALESOURCE = #{salesource,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
